Package aggregator

Class InputOutput

java.lang.Object
aggregator.InputOutput
public class InputOutput
extends java.lang.Object
A utility class containing functions for reading and writing data.
Author:
dylan

  • Method Details

    • readFile

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readFile​(java.lang.String filename)
      Reads a file line by line, returning the result as an arrayList
      Parameters:
      filename - The path to the file
      Returns:
      Arraylist A arraylist that contains the contents of a file line by line. A empty array indecates an empty file or a bad path.

    • writeFile

      public static void writeFile​(java.lang.String filename, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> list)
      Writes a file using an arraylist. Each entry in the arraylist will be on a seprate line.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the file to write to. (WILL OVERIDE DATA)
      list - The list of strings to pull from

    • createFile

      public static java.io.File createFile​(java.lang.String filepath)
      Create a new file
      Parameters:
      filepath - The location and name to use
      Returns:
      File the new file, null if creation failed

    • writeJSONFile

      public static void writeJSONFile​(java.util.ArrayList<Game> list, java.lang.String filename)
      Writes an arraylist of games into a JSON file
      Parameters:
      list - The list to use
      filename - The filename and location to write to

    • readJSONFile

      public static Game[] readJSONFile​(java.lang.String json)
      Read a JSON string into a array
      Parameters:
      json - The JSON in string format
      Returns:
      gameArray The array of game objects in the String

    • processRequest

      public static java.lang.String processRequest​(java.net.URL url)
      Send a GET request to the url given. Used for API calls
      Parameters:
      url - The URL to querry
      Returns:
      inputLine The Returned line, null if request failed

    • readRegistry

      public static java.lang.String readRegistry​(java.lang.String keyLoc, java.lang.String keyName)
      Returns the registry value using a String to find the location
      Parameters:
      keyLoc - the location of the key as a String
      keyName - the name of the key
      Returns:
      value the value of the key

    • readRegistry

      public static java.lang.String readRegistry​(com.registry.RegistryKey key, java.lang.String keyName)

      Parameters:
      keyLoc - the location of the key as a RegistryKey Object
      keyName - the name of the key
      Returns:
